properties.Title: Tracking
properties.UserDescription: Track PPM emitted in Unica via a suspended EP tax that will never actually be collected.

List.internalDescription: 6 World Objects6 World ObjectsBlast Furnace Cement Kiln Combustion Generator Oil Refinery Steam Engine Stove

Location.tooltip:
When triggered, the <ecoicon item="PolluteAir">Action Location</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="PolluteAir">Action Location</ecoicon>: The location of the object doing the polluting.

LeftNumber.tooltip:
When triggered, the <ecoicon item="PolluteAir">Pollution In PPM</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="PolluteAir">Pollution In PPM</ecoicon>: Amount of carbon dioxide released into the atmosphere this interval (30 seconds) in Parts Per Million.

Target.tooltip:
When triggered, the <ecoicon item="User">Citizen</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="User">Citizen</ecoicon>: The citizen who performed the pollution.

LeftNumber.tooltip:
When triggered, the <ecoicon item="PolluteAir">Pollution In PPM</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="PolluteAir">Pollution In PPM</ecoicon>: Amount of carbon dioxide released into the atmosphere this interval (30 seconds) in Parts Per Million.

properties.Title: Decay
properties.UserDescription: Every 6 hours, decay tracked pollution by 16%. This effectively creates a half-life of 1 day for all tracked pollution in Unica. Furthermore, tend tracked pollution downwards toward the mean tracked pollution by 16%. Finally, recalculate the proportion of pollution by the citizen to the total.

Citizen.tooltip:
When triggered, the <ecoicon item="User">Citizen</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="User">Citizen</ecoicon>: The citizen currently being processed for the timer event.

properties.Title: Distribution
properties.UserDescription: If there are EP's distributed to Unica, redistribute them to citizens based on their previously calculated usage proportion. Hold an amount X of EP's in reserve where X is determined by an external bank accoumt.

User.tooltip:
When triggered, the <ecoicon item="User">Citizen</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="User">Citizen</ecoicon>: The citizen currently being processed for the timer event.

properties.Title: Catch-Up
properties.UserDescription: Residents of Unica may 'borrow' some EPs if they currently have no allocation. The one-off amount is counted towards their usage so the next distribution tick will allocate them some.

properties.Title: Prevent Unauthorized Transfers
properties.UserDescription: Only the Government of Unica may transfer to the EP accounts.

List.internalDescription: 2 Bank Accounts2 Bank Accounts# Unica - EP Reserve # Unica - PPM Tracking

Citizen.tooltip:
When triggered, the <ecoicon item="User">Citizen</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="User">Citizen</ecoicon>: The citizen who transfered the money.

properties.Title: Reset
properties.UserDescription: Allow the Government of Unica to reset the system state.
